description:
[GTTF] Reduce header dependencies in chrome.

Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=33561

messages.text:
Another header cleanup using my experimental tool. It seems to be working. Less and less files get recompiled after each header change.

Making LoadDetails not an inner class allows me to forward-declare it (in case you ask). But I can put it back if you don't like that.

I'm fine with LoadDetails moving out. LGTM with a few updates:

http://codereview.chromium.org/457025/diff/1/8
File chrome/browser/bookmarks/bookmark_storage.h (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/457025/diff/1/8#newcode28
chrome/browser/bookmarks/bookmark_storage.h:28: // of the BookmarkLoadDetails, this ensures we don't have any threading problems.
Got one char too many.

http://codereview.chromium.org/457025/diff/1/38
File chrome/browser/spellcheck_host_observer.h (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/457025/diff/1/38#newcode8
chrome/browser/spellcheck_host_observer.h:8: class SpellCheckHostObserver {
Can you provide some quick documentation for this class?

subject: [GTTF] Reduce header dependencies in chrome.
